items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.displayname: Ultra Hold Tape - 1 1/2" X 36 Yds, Roll
items.storedisplayname2: Ultra Hold Tape - 1 1/2" X 36 Yds, Roll
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

Prep for Install

  1. Clean the hair system and bio hair with Bond Breaker Shampoo, let dry.
  2. Apply 99% Alcohol to the scalp and the base of the system to prepare for optimal adhesion. Allow to completely evaporate.
  3. Apply Max Hold Sport or Scalp Protector to the scalp to enhance the tape’s bond strength and shield against skin irritation.

 

Rolls

  1. Peel the tape from the roll and cut to the desired length.
  2. Place the adhesive side toward the unit. Avoid touching the adhesive.
  3. Place the tape piece where desired on the hair system. Repeat as needed.
  4. When ready to apply to the scalp, peel off the remaining white liner pieces. For easier application, spray Just-Rite Positioning Spray over the adhesive area to allow for more time to place and more precise placements.
  5. Press the hair system firmly onto the scalp, hold for at least 10 seconds.
